response.overview: Charlie is Not a Boy is the disturbing fairytale of a hushed soul, trapped in a crumbling household. With a perverted butcher for a father and a mother frozen in a quiet, catatonic spell, Charlie seeks solace in the whimsical world of his eccentric grandmother. As his safe haven unravels, Charlie is caught between his authentic self and the masks he must wear.
response.tagline: In a crumbling household ruled by a perverted butcher father, a hushed soul clings to the magic of his eccentric grandmother until his safe haven unravels, forcing him to choose between the masks he wears and the truth of who he is.
response.title: Charlie is Not a Boy
